## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ABO1, AtELP1, ELO2</u>
- **Gene Name:** ABA-OVERLY SENSITIVE 1, ELONGATA 2
- **Description:**   IKI3 family protein;(source:Araport11)

   - [elo2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Reduced organ growth.  Reduced cell proliferation rate.
